name: CINEVR - The Movie Theater
description: The most amazing, immersive and social, movie theater to enjoy watching movies with friends!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8.1 or later Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 or later Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD R9 290 or later DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
